override_shape: {card_id, add_primitives[], remove_primitives[], add_facets{}, remove_facets{}, scope, rationale, evidence}
trigger_condition: No rule matches but card likely relevant (e.g., contains 'counter' but pattern fails)
versioning_note: Overrides are snapshot-versioned; revalidated on rules update

trigger_condition: Text uses uncommon phrasing for ownership/controller scope
versioning_note: Prefer adding a new deterministic rule if repeats across cards

trigger_condition: Keyword appears not covered in rules mapping
versioning_note: Add keyword -> facet mapping under new taxonomy version

override_shape: Override allowed but should become a rule if common
trigger_condition: Effect depends on layers/continuous effect nuances
versioning_note: Track under 'ruleset_version' as it affects legality proof later
